name: tawk/tawk-backdrop
description: tawk.to Live Chat module for Backdrop CMS

scripts.package: composer run clean && mkdir -p ./tmp/tawk_to && cp -r ./css ./tmp/tawk_to && cp -r ./includes ./tmp/tawk_to && cp -r ./js ./tmp/tawk_to && cp -r ./libraries ./tmp/tawk_to && cp ./tawk_to.* ./tmp/tawk_to && cp README.md ./tmp/tawk_to && cp LICENSE.txt ./tmp/tawk_to && (cd ./tmp && zip -9 -rq ./tawk_to.zip ./tawk_to)
